structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases

law.catch_line: Adoption Of Suitable Form Of Complaint
law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2012. For text effective July 1, 2012, see below.] The chief justice for administration and management shall adopt a form of complaint for use under this chapter which shall be in such form and language to permit a plaintiff to prepare and file such complaint pro se. Chapter 258E: Adoption of suitable form of complaint [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 93, Sec. 114 effective July 1, 2012. See 2011, 93, Sec. 137. For text effective until July 1, 2012, see above.] The chief justice of the trial court shall adopt a form of complaint for use under this chapter which shall be in such form and language to permit a plaintiff to prepare and file such complaint pro se.
